title: Wacces 12 x 12 inch Multi-Purpose Puzzle EVA Floor Interlocking Foam Exercise Mat Tiles
feature: PROTECTIVE WORKOUT FLOOR MAT - Durable, non-skid textured tiles protect floors while creating a comfortable workout space and perfect cushion
EASY TO INSTALL - Lightweight to carry, and can be installed quickly and easily.
MULTI-FUNCTION - Can be used as a floor mat, exercise & fitness & yoga mat, kid's play room ground. Noise and water resistant
CUSTOMIZABLE - Each tile measures 12" x 12", 9 tiles in one pack, covers 9 SQ FT.
HIGH QUALITY ENVIRONMENTAL MATERIAL - High-density EVA foam, anti-fatigue anti-slip surface, anti bacterial and made from non-toxic material. easy to clean,
description: : Wacces Floor Mat comes with an excellent slip resistant advantage to prevent injuries. Exceptional resilience allow you to keep your balance during any exercise style. Moisture resistant technology makes the mat to be easily washed with soap and water. Interlocking feature and lightweight make it very simple to assemble. Wacces Eva Floor Mat has multi-function feature which allows it to use as a floor mat in homes and offices as well as in workshops, garages, sport saloons, exercise rooms. : Item comes with 9 tiles and 18 end borders. Each tile measures 12" x 12" x 3/8". One package covers 9 SQ FT
